Class PendingRequestController

java.lang.Object
sample.LogINpanelController
sample.DonorPanelController
sample.PendingRequestController
Direct Known Subclasses:
FilterRequestController
public class PendingRequestController
extends DonorPanelController
This is the controll class that handles the Pending Requests. It extends the DonorPanelController Class.

    • pressBack

      public void pressBack​(javafx.event.ActionEvent even) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is here for the functionality of the "Back" button. This will redirect the user to the parent node that is the "root" which is sample.UserPanel.fxml. This hierarchical structure is for the simplicity of the system.
      Overrides:
      pressBack in class DonorPanelController
      Parameters:
      even - , object of ActionEvent generated from click or Enter
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - which is a checked exception. Used to identify errors in i/p and o/p of a particular workflow.

    • pressReset

      public void pressReset​(javafx.event.ActionEvent even) throws java.io.IOException
      This is for the Reset of the Pending reqeusts. The modthod loads the sample.PendingRequest.fxml file and restes the list.

    • pressFilter

      public void pressFilter​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This is for the imposing od filters into the pending request list. loads the sample.FilterRequest.fxml file and imposes the filter.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This is the initializing function of the fxml components. When a the window is launched this method initializes these components. Establishes the connection with the database and upon fetching the data columns works with the property values.
      Overrides:
      initialize in class DonorPanelController
